name: Avalon Community Theater
description:
Something spooky is happening in Avalon Community Theater... and it's up to you to save the play! With tensions high and everything going wrong, your greatest obstacle may be the actors themselves. Navigate a short, decision-based story to learn about the myriad performers that call the Avalon home, and help them solve their problems using simple minigames. Perhaps together, the play can go off without a hitch. Break a leg!

This game was created for the 2020 GDEX Game Jam.
